Title: Macromedia Flash Player: Arbitrary code execution
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been identified that allows arbitrary code execution on
    a user's system via the handling of malicious SWF files.

Background.Text: The Macromedia Flash Player is a renderer for the popular SWF filetype which is commonly used to provide interactive websites, digital experiences and mobile content.

Description.Text: The Macromedia Flash Player contains multiple unspecified vulnerabilities.

Impact.Text: An attacker serving a maliciously crafted SWF file could entice a user to view the SWF file and execute arbitrary code on the user's machine.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
All Macromedia Flash Player users should upgrade to the latest
    version:
